list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in or to the backstage area in a theater.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I went backstage after the show
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đi về hậu trường sau chương trình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to or situated in the area behind the stage in a theater.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a backstage tour of the opera house
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một tour du lịch hậu trường của nhà hát opera

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the area in a theater out of view of the audience, especially in the wings or dressing rooms.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: backstage was the scene of pleasant pandemonium
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Backstage là cảnh của Pandemonium dễ chịu
